data.name: Life is Strange: Before the Storm Episode 2
data.detailed_description:
Reviews & Accolades

"...an emotional roller-coaster from beginning to end and an experience that will leave you with questions answered and tears in your eyes." - Hardcore Gamer

"...this episode offers some of the sweetest Life is Strange moments we’ve seen to date." - IGN

"...it has managed to outdo all my expectations..." - PlayStation LifeStyle

"...an emotional ride between two different worlds that are more alike than they seem and will have you grasping for more." - Cultured Vultures

"...the story, gameplay, art and music all come together to form what is another wonderful display of Deck Nine's skill" - Windows Central

"...it draws you in with interesting characters, then builds them through quiet moments and big decisions." - Game Informer


About the Game

As Chloe and Rachel’s family life continues to crumble, their friendship blossoms and the two girls discuss running away together. But before they can go, Chloe gets involved with an errand for Frank Bowers which puts her in a dangerous situation and exposes an uglier side to Arcadia Bay…

KEY FEATURES:
  • Choice and consequence driven narrative adventure
  • Multiple endings depending on the choices you make
  • ‘Backtalk’ - A risk/reward conversation mode that allows Chloe to use her barbed tongue to provoke or get her way
  • Make your mark on the world with witty tags and drawings
  • Choose Chloe’s outfit and see how people react to your look
  • Distinct Licensed indie soundtrack & original score by Daughter

fullgame.name: Life is Strange: Before the Storm

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or above (64-bit Operating System Required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 (3.1GHz) or AMD Phenom X4 945 (3.0GHz)
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 250 or NVIDIA Geforce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please note that 32-bit operating systems will not be supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 (3.7GHz) or AMD Athlon X4 845 (3.5GHz)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 460 or NVIDIA Geforce 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please note that 32-bit operating systems will not be supported
